metadata.description: Personal Claude Code plugin marketplace by Raphjay2406

plugins.name: modulo
plugins.description: Premium frontend design system with 40 skills, 7 commands, and 4 agents for creating 90k-quality websites. Covers UI patterns, SEO/GEO, accessibility, i18n, performance, testing, charts, drag-and-drop, real-time UI, and more. Works with Next.js and Astro.

plugins.name: wavy-bavy
plugins.description: Integrate the wavy-bavy library for seamless wave transitions between page sections
